fried eggs.name: Fried Eggs
steps: Heat the butter in a frying pan and crack in the two eggs.
Add salt and pepper to taste, then cover with a lid and cook for about 3 minutes until done.

pasta.name: Pasta
steps: Bring water in a pot to a boil and add the pasta.
Once it starts boiling again, reduce heat to medium and cook for 8–10 minutes.

fried fish.name: Fried Fish
steps: Cut the fish into steaks or pieces, season them and brush with lemon juice.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the fish on both sides for about 5 minutes until golden brown.

fried meat.name: Fried Meat
steps: Cut the meat into small pieces, heat the oil in a frying pan, then add the meat along with pepper, salt, and onions if desired.
Fry until fully cooked, adding a little water occasionally if needed.

fried potatoes.name: Fried Potatoes
steps: Peel the potatoes and cut them into slices or small pieces.
Heat oil in a frying pan and add the potatoes along with any additional ingredients you like.
Fry until cooked through, stirring regularly.
